Draws the tile's coloured border on the game's stage This must be called during the construction of each frame in which the border is to be shown Note that the border must only be shown if the tile is owned by someone

drawRoboticon(Roboticon, float, float) - Method in class drtn.game.util.Drawer
 
drawTooltip() - Method in class drtn.game.entity.Tile
Draws the tile's tooltip on the game's stage Specifically draws the tooltip region in the space to the top- or bottom-left of the cursor's position (depending on how high up the cursor is in the game's window) before drawing textual and visual contents inside that region This must be called during the construction of each frame in which the tooltip is to be shown
